laboratory_examinations.findings: Limited mobility of mitral valve leaflets in a four-chamber view; all chordae inserted into the posteromedial PM; short-axis view detected the posteromedial PM but not the anterolateral PM; CoA detected; left ventricular end-diastolic dimension Z score -2.41; left ventricular inlet length Z score -1.82.

All chordae connected to elongated posteromedial PM with narrowing of interchordal spaces; decreased diameter at mitral valve opening; anterolateral PM attached to the ventricular wall for its entire length; CoA confirmed; copy number variation sequencing showed normal results.
